parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

get.summary: DepositsByAccount queries deposits info for given account.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description:
address defines the address of depositor/account for which deposits are
queried.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

creator.description: creator is the bech32-encoded address of the depositor.

market_uid.description:
market_uid is the uid of market/order book against which deposit is being
made.

participation_index.title:
participation_index is the index corresponding to the order book
participation

amount.title: amount is the amount being deposited on an order book to be a house

fee.description:
fee is deducted from the deposited amount for participation in the order
book.

liquidity.description:
liquidity is the liquidity being provided to the order book after fee
deduction.

withdrawal_count.title: withdrawal_count is the total count of the withdrawals from an order book

total_withdrawal_amount.title:
total_withdrawal_amount is the total amount withdrawn from the liquidity
provided

fanx.house.Deposit.description: Deposit represents the deposit against a market held by an account.

min_deposit.description: min_deposit is the minimum acceptable deposit amount.

house_participation_fee.description:
house_participation_fee is the % of the deposit to be paid for a house
participation by the depositor.

fanx.house.Params.description: Params define the parameters for the house module.

deposits.description: deposits contains all the queried deposits.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

fanx.house.QueryDepositsByAccountRespons.title:
QueryDepositsByAccountResponse is response type for the
Query/DepositsByAccount RPC method

deposits.description: deposits is the list of deposits returned for the request.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

fanx.house.QueryDepositsResponse.title: QueryDepositsResponse is response type for the Query/Deposits RPC method

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

fanx.house.QueryParamsResponse.description:
QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.
Query/Params RPC method.

withdrawals.description: withdrawals contains all the queried withdrawals.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

fanx.house.QueryWithdrawalsByAccountResp.title:
QueryWithdrawalsByAccountResponse is response type for the
Query/WithdrawalsByAccount RPC method

id.description: withdrawal is the withdrawal attempt id.

address.description: address is the bech32-encoded address of the depositor.

market_uid.description:
market_uid is the uid of market against which the deposit is
being made.

participation_index.title: participation_index is the id corresponding to the book participation

mode.title: mode is the withdrawal mode enum value

amount.description: amount is the amount being withdrawn.

fanx.house.Withdrawal.description: Withdrawal represents the withdrawal against a deposit.

fanx.house.WithdrawalMode.description:
WithdrawalMode is the enum type for the withdrawal mode.

 - WITHDRAWAL_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: invalid
 - WITHDRAWAL_MODE_FULL: full
 - WITHDRAWAL_MODE_PARTIAL: partial
